segments.text: Do you believe that classified ads in the newspaper are the most effective way to search for a job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don't think so . I think the Internet would be better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , but I am going to look at the want ads in this newspaper first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , there is no doubt that many people have found jobs through the want ads in the newspaper .
segments.speaker: S2
